Verses: 1 en Janangale, En Ubadhesaththaik Kelungal; En Vaayin Vasanangalukku Ungal Sevigalaich Saayungal.
2 en Vaayai Uvamaigalaal Thirappen; Poorvakaalaththu Maraiporulgalai Velippaduththuven.
3 avaigalai Naangal Kelvippattu Arindhom; Engal Pidhaakkal Avaigalai Engalukkuth Theriviththaargal.
4 pinvarum Sandhadhiyaana Pillaigalukku Naangal Avaigalai Maraikkaamal, Karththarin Thudhigalaiyum Avarudaiya Balaththaiyum, Avar Seydha Avarudaiya Adhisayangalaiyum Vivarippom.
5 avar Yaakkobile Saatchiyai Erpaduththi, Isravelile Vedhaththai Sthaapiththu, Avaigalaith Thangal Pillaigalukku Arivikkumpadi Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalukkuk Kattalaiyittaar.
6 inip Pirakkum Pillaigalaagiya Pinsandhadhiyaar Adhai Arindhukondu, Avargal Ezhumbith Thangal Pillaigalukku Avaigalaich Sollumpadikkum;
7 dhevanmel Avargal Thangal Nambikkaiyai Vaiththu, Dhevanudaiya Seyalgalai Maravaamal, Avar Karpanaigalaik Kaikkollumbadikkum;

8 irudhayaththaich Sevvaippaduththaamalum, Dhevanai Urudhiyaaip Patrikkollaamalum Irundha Murattaattamum Kalagamumulla Sandhadhiyaagiya Thangal Pidhaakkalukku Avargal Oppaagaadhapadikkum, Ivaigalaik Kattalaiyittaar.
9 aayudhamanindha Vilveeraraana Eppiraayeem Puththirar Yuththanaalile Mudhugukaattinaargal.
10 avargal Dhevanudaiya Udanpadikkaiyaik Kaikkollaamalum, Avarudaiya Kattalaigalinpadi Nadakkach Sammadhiyaamalum,
11 avarudaiya Seyalgalaiyum Avar Thangalukkuk Kaanbiththa Adhisayangalaiyum Marandhaargal.
12 avargaludaiya Pidhaakkalukkumunbaaga, Egipdhudhesaththuch Sovaan Veliyile, Avar Adhisayamaanavaigalaich Seydhaar.
13 kadalaip Pilandhu, Avargalaik Kadakkappanni, Jalaththaik Kuviyalaaga Nirkumpadi Seydhaar.
14 pagalile Megaththinaalum, Raamuzhudhum Akkini Velichchaththinaalum Avargalai Vazhinadaththinaar.
15 vanaandharaththile Kanmalaigalaip Pilandhu, Magaa Aazhangalilirundhu Thanneerai Avargalukkuk Kudikkak Koduththaar.
16 kanmalaiyilirundhu Neerottangalaip Purappadappanni, Thanneerai Nadhipola Odivarumpadi Seydhaar.
17 endraalum, Avargal Pinnum Avarukku Virodhamaaip Paavanjeydhu, Varanda Veliyile Unnadhamaanavarukkuk Kobam Moottinaargal.
18 thangal Ichchaikketra Pojanaththaik Kettu, Thangal Irudhayaththil Dhevanaip Pareetchaipaarththaargal.
19 avargal Dhevanukku Virodhamaaip Pesi: Dhevan Vanaandharaththile Pojanapandhiyai Aayaththappaduththakkoodumo?

20 idho Avar Kanmalaiyai Adiththadhinaal Thanneer Purappattu, Nadhigalaaip Puranduvandhadhu; Avar Appaththaiyum Kodukkakkoodumo? Thammudaiya Janaththirku Maamsaththaiyum Aayaththappaduththuvaaro? Endraargal.
21 aagaiyaal Karththar Adhaikkettuk Kobangondaar; Avargal Dhevanai Visuvaasiyaamalum, Avarudaiya Ratchippai Nambaamalum Ponadhinaal,
22 yaakkobukku Virodhamaai Akkini Patriyerindhadhu; Isravelukku Virodhamaaik Kobam Moondadhu.
23 avar Uyaraththilulla Megangalukkuk Kattalaiyittu, Vaanaththin Kadhavugalaith Thirandhu,
24 mannaavai Avargalukku Aagaaramaaga Varushikkappanni, Vaanaththin Thaaniyaththai Avargalukkuk Koduththaar.
25 thoodhargalin Appaththai Manushan Saappittaan; Avargalukku Aagaaraththaip Pooranamaai Anuppinaar.
26 aagaasaththile Keezhkaatrai Varappanni, Thammudaiya Vallamaiyinaal Thendralaiyum Veesachcheydhu,
27 maamsaththaith Thoolaththanaiyaayum, Siragulla Paravaigalaik Kadarkarai Manalaththanaiyaayum Varushikkappanni,
28 avaigalai Avargal Paalayaththin Naduvilum, Avargal Koodaarangalaich Sutrilum Irangappanninaar.
29 avargal Pusiththuth Thirupdhiyadaindhaargal; Avargal Ichchiththadhai Avargalukkuk Koduththaar.
30 avargal Thangal Ichchaiyai Verukkavillai; Avargaludaiya Pojanam Avargal Vaayil Irukkumpodhe,
31 dhevakobam Avargalmel Ezhumbi, Avargalil Kozhuththavargalaich Sangariththu, Isravelil Viseshiththavargalai Madiyappannitru.
32 ivaiyellaam Nadandhum, Avar Seydha Adhisayangalai Avargal Nambaamal, Pinnum Paavanseydhaargal.
33 aadhalaal Avargal Naatkalai Virudhaavilum, Avargal Varushangalaip Bayangaraththilum Kazhiyappanninaar.
34 avargalai Avar Kollumpodhu Avaraikkuriththu Visaariththu, Avargal Thirumbivandhu Dhevanai Adhigaalame Thedi;
35 dhevan Thangal Kanmalaiyendrum, Unnadhamaana Dhevan Thangal Meetpar Endrum, Ninaivukoorndhaargal.
36 aanaalum Avargal Thangal Vaayinaal Avarukku Ichchakampesi, Thangal Naavinaal Avaridaththil Poisonnaargal.
37 avargal Irudhayam Avaridaththil Nilaivarappadavillai; Avarudaiya Udanpadikkaiyil Avargal Unmaiyaayirukkavillai.
38 avaro Avargalai Azhikkaamal, Irakkamullavaraai Avargal Akkiramaththai Manniththaar; Avar Thamadhu Ukkiram Muzhuvadhaiyum Ezhuppaamal, Anegandharam Thamadhu Kobaththai Vilakkivittaar.
39 avargal Maamsamendrum, Thirumbivaraamal Agalugira Kaatrendrum Ninaivukoorndhaar.
40 eththanaidharamo Vanaandharaththile Avarukkuk Kobam Mootti, Avaandharaveliyile Avarai Visanappaduththinaargal.
41 avargal Thirumbi Dhevanaip Pareetchai Paarththu, Isravelin Parisuththarai Mattuppaduththinaargal.
42 avarudaiya Karaththaiyum, Avar Thangalaich Saththuruvukku Vilakki Meetta Naalaiyum Ninaiyaamarponaargal.
43 avar Egipdhile Thammudaiya Adaiyaalangalaiyum, Sovaan Veliyile Thammudaiya Arpudhangalaiyum Seydhaar.
44 avargaludaiya Nadhigalai Raththamaaga Maatri, Avargaludaiya Aarugalilulla Jalaththaik Kudikkakkoodaadhapadi Seydhaar.
45 avargalai Azhikkumpadi Vandu Jaadhigalaiyum, Avargalaik Kedukkumpadi Thavalaigalaiyum Avargalukkulle Anuppinaar.
46 avargaludaiya Vilaichchalaip Puzhukkalukkum, Avargaludaiya Pirayaasaththin Balanai Vettukkiligalukkum Koduththaar.
47 kalmazhaiyinaal Avargaludaiya Thiraatsachchedigalaiyum, Aalaangattiyinaal Avargaludaiya Aththimarangalaiyum Azhiththu,
48 avargaludaiya Mirugajeevangalaik Kalmazhaikkum, Avargaludaiya Aadumaadugalai Idigalukkum Oppukkoduththaar.
49 thamadhu Ukkiramaana Kobaththaiyum, Moorkkaththaiyum, Sinaththaiyum, Ubaththiravaththaiyum, Theenguseyyum Thoodhargalaiyum Avargalukkulle Anuppinaar.
50 avar Thammudaiya Kobaththukku Vazhithirandhu, Avargal Aaththumaavai Maranaththukku Vilakkik Kaavaamal, Avargal Jeevanaik Kollainoikku Oppukkoduththaar.
51 egipdhile Thalaichchangal Anaiththaiyum, Kaamin Koodaarangalile Avargaludaiya Belanil Mudharbalanaana Yaavaraiyum Azhiththu;
52 thammudaiya Janangalai Aadugalaippol Purappadappanni, Avargalai Vanaandharaththile Mandhaiyaippol Koottikkondupoi;
53 avargal Bayappadaadhapadikku Avargalaip Baththiramaai Vazhinadaththinaar; Avargal Saththurukkalaik Kadalmoodippottadhu.
54 avargalaith Thamadhu Parisuththa Sthalaththin Ellaivaraikkum, Thamadhu Valadhukaram Sambaadhiththa Indhap Parvadhamattukkum Azhaiththukkonduvandhu,
55 avargal Mugaththirku Munbaaga Jaadhigalaith Thuraththivittu, Dhesaththai Noolpottup Pangittu, Avargaludaiya Koodaarangalil Isravelin Koththirangalaik Kudiyetrinaar.
56 aanaalum Avargal Unnadhamaana Dhevanaip Pareetchaipaarththu, Avarukkuk Kobam Mootti, Avarudaiya Saatchigalaik Kaikkollaamarpoi,
57 thangal Pidhaakkalaippola Vazhivilagi, Dhurogampanni, Mosampokkum Villaippol Thuvandu,
58 thangal Medaigalinaal Avarukkuk Kobam Mootti, Thangal Vikkirakangalinaal Erichchal Undaakkinaargal.
59 dhevan Adhaik Kettu Ukkiramaagi, Isravelai Migavum Veruththu,
60 thaam Manusharukkulle Potta Koodaaramaagiya Seelovilulla Vaasasthalaththai Vittuvilagi,
61 thamadhu Balaththaich Siraiyiruppukkum, Thamadhu Magimaiyaich Saththuruvin Kaikkum Oppukkoduththu,
62 thamadhu Janaththaip Pattayaththukku Iraiyaakki, Thamadhu Sudhandharaththinmel Kobankondaar.
63 avargal Vaalibarai Akkini Patchiththadhu, Avargal Kanniyaasthireegal Vaazhkkaippadaadhirundhaargal.
64 avargaludaiya Aasaariyargal Pattayaththaal Vizhundhaargal, Avargaludaiya Vidhavaigal Azhavillai.
65 appozhudhu Aandavar Niththirai Thelindhavanaippolavum, Thiraatcharasaththaal Gembeerikkira Baraakkiramasaaliyaippolavum Vizhiththu,
66 thammudaiya Saththurukkalaip Pinburamaaga Adiththu, Avargalukku Niththiya Nindhaiyai Varappanninaar.
67 avar Yoseppin Koodaaraththaip Purakkaniththaar; Eppiraayeem Koththiraththai Avar Therindhukollaamal,
68 yoodhaa Koththiraththaiyum Thamakkup Piriyamaana Seeyon Parvadhaththaiyum Therindhukondaar.
69 thammudaiya Parisuththa Sthalaththai Malaigalaippolavum, Endraikkum Nirkumpadi Thaam Asthibaarappaduththina Boomiyaippolavum Kattinaar.
70 thammudaiya Thaasanaagiya Thaaveedhaith Therindhukondu, Aattuththozhuvangalilirundhu Avanai Eduththaar.
71 karavalaadugalin Pinnaagath Thirindha Avanai, Thammudaiya Janamaagiya Yaakkobaiyum Thammudaiya Sudhandharamaagiya Isravelaiyum Meyppadharkaaga, Azhaiththukkonduvandhaar.
72 ivan Avargalaith Than Irudhayaththin Unmaiyinpadiye Meyththu, Than Kaigalin Thiramaiyinaal Avargalai Nadaththinaan.
